trans-unit.source: Point a company Internet domain to a Traffic Manager domain | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Point a company Internet domain to a Traffic Manager domain | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: This article will help you point your company domain name to a Traffic Manager domain name.
trans-unit.target: This article will help you point your company domain name to a Traffic Manager domain name.

trans-unit.source: Point a company Internet domain to a Azure Traffic Manager domain
trans-unit.target: Point a company Internet domain to a Azure Traffic Manager domain

trans-unit.source: To point your company domain name to a Traffic Manager domain name, modify the DNS resource record on your Internet DNS server to use the CNAME record type, which maps your company domain name to the domain name of your Traffic Manager profile.
trans-unit.target: To point your company domain name to a Traffic Manager domain name, modify the DNS resource record on your Internet DNS server to use the CNAME record type, which maps your company domain name to the domain name of your Traffic Manager profile.

trans-unit.source: You can see the Traffic Manager domain name in the **General** section on the Configuration page of the Traffic Manager profile.
trans-unit.target: You can see the Traffic Manager domain name in the **General** section on the Configuration page of the Traffic Manager profile.

trans-unit.source: For example, to point the company domain name www.contoso.com to the Traffic Manager domain name contoso.trafficmanager.net, you would update your DNS resource record to be the following:
trans-unit.target: For example, to point the company domain name www.contoso.com to the Traffic Manager domain name contoso.trafficmanager.net, you would update your DNS resource record to be the following:

trans-unit.source: All traffic requests to *www.contoso.com* will now be directed to *contoso.trafficmanager.net*.
trans-unit.target: All traffic requests to *www.contoso.com* will now be directed to *contoso.trafficmanager.net*.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.IMPORTANT] You cannot point a second-level domain, such as *contoso.com*, to the Traffic Manager domain.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.IMPORTANT] You cannot point a second-level domain, such as *contoso.com*, to the Traffic Manager domain.

trans-unit.source: This is a limitation of the DNS protocol, which does not allow CNAME records for second-level domain names.
trans-unit.target: This is a limitation of the DNS protocol, which does not allow CNAME records for second-level domain names.

trans-unit.target: About Traffic Manager traffic routing methods

trans-unit.target: Traffic Manager - Disable, enable or delete a profile
